description:
I build an epic boss battle dungeon room for D&D and Frostgrave.
➢Watch the Dungeon Entrance Build!: https://youtu.be/miPMfwc_CYc
➢All my Terrain Playlist: https://tinyurl.com/yyco9kkr 
➢The Summergrove Wargaming Table: https://tinyurl.com/y7kt2urd
          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
On my website, you'll find Terrain for sale, templates for some of the builds, recommended products, and The Hall of Glorious Crafts where exceptionally epic fan-made projects are showcased!
➢Website: https://bardscraft.wixsite.com/craft/inventory-2
➢Join the Path of Tabletop Crafting!: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢Tip Jar: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XSBDFANJXHREA&source=url
➢Bard's Craft Nerd Chat: https://discord.gg/n5AfW36

           -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ESSENTIAL STUFF FOR CRAFTING!

➢Elmer's PVA Glue:
 -USA: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002FTOBZE/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bardscraft-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B002FTOBZE&linkId=c5a234d09c165f06a4b07c046bea20a7
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/2TMEbrb
 
➢Army Painter Starter Set: 
 -USA: https://amzn.to/3a88BKn 
 -UK: https://amzn.to/2t7rTPu 
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/2NGfglm

➢Matt Black Spray Primer:
 -USA: https://amzn.to/36yzdkG
 -UK: https://amzn.to/2RV2yjX
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/311ZuGI

➢Citadel Paints: 
 -USA: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=citadel+paint&i=toys-and-games&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=ur2&linkId=a4fa3b6e6c0cf3a6d7fc30f0b4d090d6&tag=bardscraft-20
 -UK: https://www.amazon.co.uk/s?k=citadel+paint&i=toys&camp=1634&creative=6738&linkCode=ur2&linkId=16c525d0fb9780a564bb67ac51624d9e&tag=bardscraft-21
 -Canada: https://www.amazon.ca/s?k=citadel+paint&i=toys&camp=15121&creative=330641&linkCode=ur2&linkId=0f1551ec583c8607a6f44a305bbb05fe&tag=bardscraft09-20

➢Start playing Dungeons & Dragons by getting the Core Rulebooks: 
 -USA: https://amzn.to/2MI4GK7 
 -UK: https://amzn.to/38ldwWt 
 -Canada: https://amzn.to/368Q9Ov

I'm set up as an Amazon Affiliate in some regions. Especially to make it easier for new crafters I have linked to products I use and recommend. Any purchases through affiliate links grant me a small commission which is a good way to support the channel at no extra cost. More recommended products on my website.

          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
